properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 2:49PM MST until January 2 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 15
inches, mainly on west facing slopes. Winds gusting as high as
65 mph.

* WHERE...Absaroka/Beartooth Mountains.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to midnight MST Wednesday night.
Heaviest snow expected to be late tonight and early Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Significant accumulations above 7000 feet will produce
difficult backcountry conditions.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT MST WEDNESDAY NIGHT
